tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE social_media_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username TEXT,
    post_text TEXT,
    sentiment_score FLOAT,
    date_posted DATE
);

CREATE TABLE SocialMediaData (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_id INT,
    post_content TEXT,
    sentiment_score INT,
    campaign_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE campaign_performance (
    campaign_id INT,
    impressions INT,
    clicks INT,
    conversions INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (campaign_id) REFERENCES marketing_campaigns(campaign_id)
);
